Package edu.univ.scientometrics.controller

Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
edu.univ.scientometrics.controller.DatabaseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/database") public class DatabaseController extends Object
REST Controller for database operations. Provides endpoints to: - Save API results to database - Query stored data - View statistics Sprint 3 Features: - Search and save researcher data - View all saved articles - Get database statistics
Since:
1.0
Author:
Sprint 3 Team

  • Method Details

    • searchAndSave

      @PostMapping("/save") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> searchAndSave(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam(defaultValue="3") int maxArticles)
      Searches Google Scholar and saves results to database. Sprint 3 Requirement: Store 2 researchers with 3 articles each Endpoint: POST /api/database/save
      Parameters:
      name - Researcher name to search
      maxArticles - Maximum articles to save (default: 3)
      Returns:
      Confirmation message with saved data count

    • getAllArticles

      @GetMapping("/articles") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ArticleDTO>> getAllArticles()
      Retrieves all articles from database. Endpoint: GET /api/database/articles
      Returns:
      List of all articles as DTOs

    • getAllResearchers

      @GetMapping("/researchers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ResearcherEntity>> getAllResearchers()
      Retrieves all researchers from database. Endpoint: GET /api/database/researchers
      Returns:
      List of all researchers

    • getArticlesByResearcher

      @GetMapping("/articles/researcher/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ArticleDTO>> getArticlesByResearcher(@PathVariable Long id)
      Gets articles for a specific researcher. Endpoint: GET /api/database/articles/researcher/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - Researcher ID
      Returns:
      List of articles by that researcher

    • getStatistics

      @GetMapping("/stats") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getStatistics()
      Gets database statistics. Endpoint: GET /api/database/stats
      Returns:
      Statistics about stored data

    • clearAllData

      @DeleteMapping("/clear") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> clearAllData()
